item.title: Rico's Favorite Foods
item.description:
Rico absolutely loves to eat. Some of his favorite snacks include lettuce, pizza, baby carrots, slices of deli turkey and of course BACON! His daily kibble is Blue Buffalo Lamb and Rice.

Rico’s diet was very easy to figure out after clearing up many of his allergies. The Blue Buffalo brand of food really was a great help in determining
